text:
JEFF THOMAS: One of the
things that Herman would

do to kind of cultivate
his daughter would
be take her to his work site.

He'd then ask his
daughter to go along,

and then he would make a game
of the fact of when do you
think quitting time will be?

And he would say, you know,
I'll bet $5 against your body

was his exact statement,
that you can't guess
when we'll be done for the day.

- How horribly wrong
is this entire story?

How horribly wrong is the
journey of this creep?

Poster boy for devious, deviant,
horrible, nasty destroyer
of children's lives.

Why didn't society say, we
have to make sure this guy has
no access to children?
- He made me sleep on the couch.
I was sleeping.
I get woke up to--

now that I'm older,
I know it was porno.

And he came over
to me, and told me

that what they was doing on TV
is what I needed to be doing.

I do remember him
fondling with my breast.

And he told me that that's
just how it's going to be,
and it's normal.
